request.description:
StartFragment

### Available Field Names for Removal:

- site_icon, logo
    
- banner_side_img, banner_bg_img, banner_btn
    
- welcome_bg, welcome_btn
    
- winner_bg, winner_side_image, winner_btn
    
- promotion_bg, promotion_side_img, promotion1_bg
    
- promotion1_icon1, promotion1_icon2, promotion1_icon3, promotion1_icon4, promotion1_icon5
    
- top_footer_bg, top_footer_icon1, top_footer_icon2, top_footer_icon3
    
- footer_payment_icon1, footer_payment_icon2, footer_payment_icon3, footer_payment_icon4
    
- client_img1, client_img2, client_img3, client_img4, client_img5, client_promo_icon1
    

EndFragment
